front.title: APIs To Expose SCONEPRO Metadata to Applications

abstract.t: This document describes API considerations to provide applications with network-supplied information about acceptable network flow rates. Since this information is expected to be signalled from the network within the stack below the application using the SCONEPRO protocol (to be defined by the IETF), it needs to be made accessible to applications in order for them to pick proper video rates, or to otherwise confine the application behavior within network-defined limits.
